Job description
IBM Global Business Services: Join a leader. Consult with us.

IBM's Mobile Applications team is a global leader in providing clients with mobile application development and system integration related services and support capabilities.

An Application Solutions Architect is needed in the Mobile Applications team within IBM’s GBS business. As an Application Solutions Architect you lead in the translation of the client's business requirements into specific systems, applications and process designs. Working with client personnel you identify functional requirements, lead the design and implementation of the client's Mobile solution. IBM develops mobile applications for a variety of device platforms including: iPhone, BlackBerry, Android, Symbian and Windows Mobile. Additional responsibilities include acting as lead consulting architect on many accounts by leading the selling process, proposal development, estimation and statements of work. We will need you to perform project leadership roles with regards to contract and satisfaction delivery.

Skills:

Proficiency in Services-Oriented Architecture, Design and Implementation
Hands-on experience in Mobile Application Development and associated SDKs.
Strong background in Application Design and Development
Proven skills in project leadership and delivery
Project Planning and Estimating
Pre sales and Proposal Development
Client Management

Required
Bachelor's Degree
At least 5 years experience in Application Development and Solution Architecture
English: Fluent

Preferred
Information Technology
